question: 3) Will I return to the same job after my holiday?
origin_context: 3) Will I return to the same job after my holiday? Your reassignment depends on customer arrangements, as some may hire replacement workers during your absence. If the customer has arranged for a replacement, your previous position may no longer be available. In such cases, management will provide an alternative job placement based on availability and operational needs. Workers will be informed of their reassignment details in a timely manner. Factors such as the length of absence, customer demand, and operational requirements may influence reassignment decisions. Employees are encouraged to consult with management beforehand to understand their options.

In such cases, management will provide an alternative job placement based on availability and operational needs [Sen 7]. Workers will be informed of their reassignment details in a timely manner [Sen 8]. Factors such as the length of absence, customer demand, and operational requirements may influence reassignment decisions [Sen 9]. Employees are encouraged to consult with management beforehand to understand their options [Sen 10].

Workers will be informed of their reassignment details in a timely manner.

Employees are encouraged to consult with management prior to reassignment to understand their available options.

question: 4) What should I do if my savings are deducted monthly but not reflected in my statement?
origin_context: 4) What should I do if my savings are deducted monthly but not reflected in my statement? Inform your immediate superior or designated interpreter as soon as possible to lodge a formal complaint. They will escalate the issue to the Payroll department to resolve the matter and ensure your statement is properly updated. Management will escalate the issue to the Payroll department for investigation and resolution. The Payroll department will review the records, correct any discrepancies, and ensure your statement is properly updated. Workers should monitor subsequent statements and confirm that the corrections have been made. If the issue persists, they should seek further clarification from the Payroll department.
context: Inform your immediate superior or designated interpreter as soon as possible to lodge a formal complaint [Sen 11]. They will escalate the issue to the Payroll department to resolve the matter and ensure your statement is properly updated [Sen 12]. Management will escalate the issue to the Payroll department for investigation and resolution [Sen 13]. The Payroll department will review the records, correct any discrepancies, and ensure your statement is properly updated [Sen 14]. Workers should monitor subsequent statements and confirm that the corrections have been made [Sen 15]. If the issue persists, they should seek further clarification from the Payroll department [Sen 16].

The immediate superior or designated interpreter will escalate the complaint to the Payroll department for resolution and to ensure the employee's statement is properly updated.
Management is responsible for escalating the issue to the Payroll department for investigation and resolution.
The Payroll department will review the records, correct any discrepancies found, and ensure the employee's statement is properly updated.
Workers are expected to monitor their subsequent pay statements to confirm that the necessary corrections have been made.
If the issue persists after review, workers should seek further clarification directly from the Payroll department.

question: 5) How do I handle an expired passport?
origin_context: 5) How do I handle an expired passport? Management continuously tracks passport expiration dates to ensure timely renewal. Workers should be aware that a passport must remain valid for at least 18 months before the work permit expires to comply with regulatory requirements. Workers will receive advance notice of their passport renewal date, along with appointment details at the respective embassy. They are advised to prepare any necessary documents beforehand to prevent delays. An interpreter will accompany the worker to the designated embassy, providing support with communication and ensuring a smooth renewal process. Passport renewal fees vary by nationality: Nepal – RM240; Bangladesh – RM305; Myanmar – RM430. Failure to renew the passport on time may result in work permit complications, fines, or penalties that could affect the worker’s employment status. Workers must adhere to renewal deadlines to prevent disruptions.

Workers will receive advance notice of their passport renewal date and appointment details at the respective embassy.
Workers are advised to prepare necessary documents in advance to prevent delays in the passport renewal process.
An interpreter will accompany the worker to the designated embassy to provide communication support and assist in ensuring a smooth passport renewal process.
Passport renewal fees vary by nationality: RM240 for Nepali citizens, RM305 for Bangladeshi citizens, and RM430 for Myanmar citizens.
Failure to renew the passport on time may lead to work permit complications, fines, or penalties that could impact the worker’s employment status.
Workers must adhere to passport renewal deadlines to avoid disruptions to their employment.

question: 6) What should I do if my new permit has not been issued by Immigration, despite my old permit expiring?
origin_context: 6) What should I do if my new permit has not been issued by Immigration, despite my old permit expiring? Delays in work permit issuance may occur due to various factors, such as pending FOMEMA medical results, a lost passport, or other administrative processing issues. Workers should check with management to identify the specific reason for the delay. If the new permit is delayed, a Special Pass (SP) can be issued as a temporary permit, valid for one month while awaiting the new permit. A RM100 fee is required for the Special Pass application, which should be paid as per immigration procedures. Workers should verify whether this fee is covered by the company or if they are responsible for payment. If the new permit continues to be delayed, the Special Pass will be renewed continuously until Immigration issues the new work permit. Workers should ensure they follow up regularly for status updates. The company’s administration will oversee the entire process, including permit applications and renewals. Workers are encouraged to stay informed and coordinate with management regarding their permit status.

question: 7) What should I do if my passport is lost?
origin_context: 7) What should I do if my passport is lost? Report the loss to your immediate superior or designated interpreter as soon as possible. It is advisable to do this promptly to avoid delays in the replacement process. Management will arrange for a police report, and the worker must accompany them to file it. Ensure all relevant details are provided accurately. After obtaining the police report, submit it along with any required supporting documents to the respective embassy to apply for a replacement passport. Workers should be aware of any applicable fees for the passport replacement process. Once the new passport is issued, proceed to the Immigration Department to apply for a valid work permit. Workers should also ensure that they securely store copies of their passport and permit.
context: Report the loss to your immediate superior or designated interpreter as soon as possible [Sen 34]. It is advisable to do this promptly to avoid delays in the replacement process [Sen 35]. Management will arrange for a police report, and the worker must accompany them to file it [Sen 36]. Ensure all relevant details are provided accurately [Sen 37]. After obtaining the police report, submit it along with any required supporting documents to the respective embassy to apply for a replacement passport [Sen 38]. Workers should be aware of any applicable fees for the passport replacement process [Sen 39]. Once the new passport is issued, proceed to the Immigration Department to apply for a valid work permit [Sen 40]. Workers should also ensure that they securely store copies of their passport and permit [Sen 41].
objective-facts: The worker must report the loss to their immediate superior or designated interpreter as soon as possible.
Prompt reporting of the loss is advised to avoid delays in the replacement process.
Management will arrange for a police report to be filed regarding the lost document.
The worker is required to accompany management when filing the police report.
All relevant details must be provided accurately when filing the police report.
After obtaining the police report, the worker must submit it along with any required supporting documents to the respective embassy to apply for a replacement passport.
Workers should be aware of any fees applicable to the passport replacement process.
Once the new passport is issued, the worker must proceed to the Immigration Department to apply for a valid work permit.
Workers are advised to securely store copies of their passport and work permit.

origin_context: 8) Documents retained by workers while their passports are held by management. Workers will be provided with a laminated photocopy of their passport or permit and are encouraged to keep it secure, as they may need to present it for verification when inspected by authorities. If the laminated copy is lost or damaged, workers should promptly report it to the designated contact person for replacement. Workers are advised to carry the laminated copy whenever they go out to ensure smooth interactions with authorities and avoid unnecessary complications. If inspected by authorities, workers should present the laminated copy for verification, as digital copies may not always be accepted. Additionally, workers can access digital copies of their passport or permit through the MTS On The Go apps.

question: 9) How to view my salary statement?
origin_context: 9) How to view my salary statement? You can view your salary statement by logging into the MTS On The Go apps. Once logged in, navigate to the "Salary" section and select the option to view your statement. Salary statements for previous months may also be available. If you encounter any issues, such as missing salary details or difficulties accessing the platform, promptly contact your immediate superior or the designated interpreter for assistance.

question: 10) What is refund process after returning from holiday?
origin_context: 10) What is refund process after returning from holiday? Upon returning from holiday, the deposit and other related amounts, including one-way airfare, will be processed for release within one week. However, funds are disbursed every Wednesday, meaning the actual release date depends on the closest Wednesday following the worker’s return. Workers should ensure they complete any necessary administrative steps to facilitate the refund process. If there are delays, workers should promptly consult the designated department for clarification and resolution.
context: Upon returning from holiday, the deposit and other related amounts, including one-way airfare, will be processed for release within one week [Sen 52]. However, funds are disbursed every Wednesday, meaning the actual release date depends on the closest Wednesday following the worker’s return [Sen 53]. Workers should ensure they complete any necessary administrative steps to facilitate the refund process [Sen 54]. If there are delays, workers should promptly consult the designated department for clarification and resolution [Sen 55].
objective-facts: The deposit and other related amounts, including one-way airfare, will be processed for release within one week after the worker returns from holiday.
Funds are disbursed every Wednesday, so the actual release date of the deposit and related amounts depends on the closest Wednesday following the worker’s return from holiday.
Workers are required to complete any necessary administrative steps to facilitate the refund process upon returning from holiday.
If there are delays in the refund process, workers should promptly consult the designated department for clarification and resolution.

3-questions.answer: Workers must complete any necessary administrative steps [Clue 3].
3-questions.positive: Workers must complete any necessary administrative steps [Doc doc1_question10, Sen 54].

short-answer.reason: The reference [Doc doc1_question10, Sen 54] correctly identifies the sentence that directly answers the question: "Workers should ensure they complete any necessary administrative steps to facilitate the refund process." This sentence explicitly states the action required by workers, making it the most concise and accurate reference.
short-answer.answer: Workers must complete any necessary administrative steps [Doc doc1_question10, Sen 54].

long-answer.reason: In addition to the direct answer in [Sen 54], other sentences provide contextual relevance to the refund process upon return from holiday. [Sen 53] clarifies the weekly disbursement schedule, adding context about timing dependencies. [Sen 55] advises workers to consult the designated department if delays occur, which complements the required actions by indicating follow-up steps. Together, these sentences align with the overall process described in the question and support the full scope of actions related to the refund.
long-answer.answer: Workers must complete any necessary administrative steps [Doc doc1_question10, Sen 52,53,54,55].
